parameters.name: ExperimentId
parameters.description: The ID of the experiment that the run belongs.

parameters.name: GmtCreateTime
parameters.description: The time when the instance was created.

parameters.name: Labels
parameters.description:
The label. Exact match is supported. Valid values:

*   Single-label query: Set the value to is_evaluation.
*   Multi-label query (not recommended in non-special scenarios and may have performance issues): Set the value to is_evaluation:true,LLM_evaluation:true. Multiple labels are separated with commas (,), indicating that the key-value pairs of multiple labels must be matched at the same time.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries in the request. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which the entries are sorted by the specific field on the returned page. This parameter must be used together with SortBy.

*   ASC
*   DESC (default)

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: The strings by which the results are sorted. The following parameters can be used to sort the results: GmtCreateTime and Name. The sorting order can be ASC (default) and DESC. Separate multiple strings with commas (,).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be greater than 0. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The pagination token, which starts from 0. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field used for sorting. Valid values:

*   Name: the name of the run.
*   GmtCreateTime: the time when the run is created.

parameters.name: SourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workload associated with the run.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of the workload associated with the run.

parameters.name: Verbose
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to show detailed information, including Metrics, Params, and Labels. Valid values:

*   true
*   false (default)

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the workspace to which the experiment belongs. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.

>  If you do not specify a workspace ID, the system returns the runs of the default workspace.
